Traveller tips website is a personal blog where I give some special hints and tips for travellers. I try to find most interesting places during my trips for good photo and video materials. If you are a traveller and what to find the most interesting and sometimes hidden places around the Globe - this website is a great starting point.

  • Get to the exclusion zone without the permit

    29 August 2017

    If you are about stalking - you can easily get to the Exclusion Zone in the Chernobyl region. This is not a Chernobyl itself, but the place is within the 30km alienation area and already a place to feel the Stuff.
